p:
The gene ontology (GO) term enrichment of DEGs was analyzed using GOSeq (v.1.24)
54 , controlling for gene-length bias. All genes expressed in the samples were used as a background set in order to find over-represented GO terms in the DEGs. Hypergeometric test (Benjamini and Hochberg correction) was performed to compensate for multiple testing at a significance level set to a value of < 0.05 in our analyses.
